backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining the saree shop backend with types and CRUD operations for Sarees, Orders, and Customers, including blob storage integration for saree images.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming the brand name update from 'Silk Splendor' to 'KBR Silks' was applied in frontend/index.html and frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, describing their purpose and key implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell that sets the browser tab title to 'KBR Silks' and mounts the React app via src/main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for Catalog, AdminSarees, AdminOrders, and AdminCustomers pages, all wrapped in the Layout component.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App shell component rendering a sticky crimson/gold gradient header with the 'KBR Silks' brand, responsive desktop and mobile navigation, and a footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP actor, invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on sarees, orders, and customers, wrapping backend actor calls with query invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Google Fonts and defining Tailwind base/component layers with a 'Silk Splendor' brand palette (crimson, gold, ivory) for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminCustomers.tsx: Admin page for managing customers, featuring a sortable table and a modal dialog for adding or editing customer records with validation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminOrders.tsx: Admin page displaying all orders in a sortable table with inline order status updates via a styled dropdown select per row.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSarees.tsx: Admin page for managing saree inventory with a modal form supporting image upload, fabric type selection, and add/edit/delete operations.
frontend/src/pages/Catalog.tsx: Displays a searchable, filterable saree catalog page with a responsive grid of SareeCard components showing image, fabric type, color, price, and stock. Fetches saree data via a custom hook and supports filtering by name, fabric type, and color.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the theme with custom brand color tokens (crimson, gold, ivory, teal), serif/sans-serif font families, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the current state of the KBR Silks business app project, listing implemented features (catalog, admin panel, orders, customers, navigation, branding) with their requirement IDs and versions.
